verses.verse: The fool<WH5036> has said<WH559> in his heart<WH3820>, There is no God<WH430>. Corrupt<WH7843> are they<WH8581>, and have done abominable iniquity<WH5766>: there is none that does<WH6213> good<WH2896>.
God<WH430> looked down<WH8259> from heaven<WH8064> upon the sons<WH1121> of men<WH120>, to see<WH7200> if there were<WH3426> any that did understand<WH7919>, that did seek<WH1875> God<WH430>.
Every one of them is gone back<WH5472>: they are altogether<WH3162> become filthy<WH444>; there is none that does<WH6213> good<WH2896>, no<WH259>, not one.
Have the workers<WH6466> of iniquity<WH205> no knowledge<WH3045>? who eat up<WH398> my people<WH5971> as they eat<WH398> bread<WH3899>: they have not called<WH7121> upon God<WH430>.

There were they in great<WH6343> fear<WH6342>, where no fear<WH6343> was<WH430>: for God has scattered<WH6340> the bones<WH6106> of him that encamps<WH2583> against you<WH954>: you have put them to shame, because God<WH430> has despised them<WH3988>.

Oh that<WH5414> the salvation<WH3444> of Israel<WH3478> were come out of Zion<WH6726>! When God<WH430> brings back<WH7725> the captivity<WH7622> of his people<WH5971>, Jacob<WH3290> shall rejoice<WH1523>, and Israel<WH3478> shall be glad<WH8055>.
